org.dei.controller

Class DiagnosticController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dei.controller.DiagnosticController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/diagnostico")
public class DiagnosticController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller for handling diagnostic-related requests.

public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Resposta> iniciarDiagnostico(@RequestBody
                                                                                                            Carro selectedCar)
        Starts the diagnostic process for a selected car.
        Parameters:
        selectedCar - the car selected for diagnosis
        Returns:
        a ResponseEntity containing the initial Resposta object

      • obterPerguntaAnterior

        @PostMapping(value="/perguntaAnterior")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> obterPerguntaAnterior(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                Resposta resposta,
                                                                                                                                @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String perguntaAtual)
        Retrieves the previous question based on the current question and the given response.
        Parameters:
        resposta - the user's response
        perguntaAtual - the current question
        Returns:
        a ResponseEntity containing the previous question or an error message

      • obterRegrasFaltantesParaDiagnosticosAlternativos

        @PostMapping(value="/caminhosDiagnostico")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>>> obterRegrasFaltantesParaDiagnosticosAlternativos(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                              Resposta resposta)
        Retrieves the missing rules for alternative diagnoses based on the given response.
        Parameters:
        resposta - the user's response
        Returns:
        a ResponseEntity containing a map of missing rules by diagnosis
